title: Prove the Erd≈ës factorial divisibility conjecture
description: Read PROBLEM.md. Produce a natural language proof and a Lean 4 proof of the theorem. The Lean proof must compile with lake build and contain no sorry. Decompose this into appropriate subtasks. The first step should be formalizing the precise mathematical statement (what exactly does 'ignoring small primes' mean?). Use testCommand 'lake build' on all Lean implementation tasks.
